name: Paul McCandless
description: '''Paul Brownlee McCandless Jr.''' (born March 24, 1947) is an American multi-instrumentalist and founding member of the American [[jazz]] group [[Oregon (band)|Oregon]]. He is one of the few jazz [[oboe|oboists]]. He also plays [[bass clarinet]], [[cor anglais|English horn]], [[flute]], [[penny whistle]], [[tenor saxophone]], [[sopranino saxophone]],  and [[soprano saxophone]].
